00018 GeneratorChainSelector::GeneratorChainSelector(QDomNode& generatorChainNode):
00019 unique_(false), operator_(General::OR), groupNames_(), generatorChainRef_() {
00020 
00021         // get the spirit:unique attribute
00022         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = generatorChainNode.attributes();
00023         QString unique = attributeMap.namedItem(QString("spirit:unique")).
00024                         nodeValue();
00025         unique_ = General::str2Bool(unique, false);
00026 
00027         for (int i = 0; i < generatorChainNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00028                 QDomNode tempNode = generatorChainNode.childNodes().at(i);
00029 
00030                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:groupSelector")) {
00031                         // get the selection operator
00032                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00033 
00034                         operator_ = General::str2GroupSelector(attributeMap.namedItem(
00035                                         QString("spirit:multipleGroupSelectionOperator")).
00036                                         nodeValue(), General::OR);
00037 
00038                         groupNames_.append(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:generatorChainRef")) {
00042 
00043                         generatorChainRef_ =General::createVLNV(tempNode, VLNV::GENERATORCHAIN);
00044                 }
00045         }
00046 
00047         // if mandatory fields are missing
00048         if (groupNames_.size() < 1) {
00049                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00050                                 "spirit:generatorChainSelector"));
00051         }
00052         return;
00053 }
